TEI.2.document_title: Edwin L Pettit to Stephen F Austin, 04-05-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Edward L. Pettit to Austin, New Orleans, April 5, 1830. Reporting revolutionary conditions in Mexico. A bill has been framed by the Government to stop immigration to Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 357

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Edward L. Pettit to Austin, New Orleans, April 5, 1830. Reporting revolutionary conditions in Mexico. A bill has been framed by the Government to stop immigration to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*New Orleans April 5th 1830*/p* *p*Dear Sir;*/p*
*p*By the Schr. Pocahontas which leaves this *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">tomorrow */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* I take liberty of writing you, and sending the *location_mentioned*N. A. Review*/location_mentioned* containing an interesting peice on *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.— I have succeed in recovering the amt of the insurance on my Vessel and am anxiously waiting the next Vessel from *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* (which is hourly expected) to determine whether to proceed to *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, you are doubtless in possession of what is transacting in that *location_mentioned*city*/location_mentioned*, and I presume that *person_mentioned*Genl. Teran*/person_mentioned*, as well as the *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*and the national Sch. of War, Mosque will have arrived— by the last accounts from *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned*, It appears that a *person_mentioned*committee of Congress*/person_mentioned* have reported a project of a Law (which If passed will violate the Public Faith in the instance of your contracts with the Government) to stop the Emigration of *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, The Brig of war Bravo was also preparing for sea to arrive *location_mentioned*between Tampico and Galveston Bay,*/location_mentioned* Between us in confidence from all I have been able to learn the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*is very unsettled, the *location_mentioned*States of Yucatan and Tabasco*/location_mentioned*, have determined to split off unless a central Government is Established, and it is my opinion that *person_mentioned*Genl. Santa Ana*/person_mentioned* is only waiting until the *person_mentioned*present administration*/person_mentioned* becomes a little unpopular to raise a Grito, and place himself at the *person_mentioned*Head of the Republic*/person_mentioned* as *person_mentioned*Dictator*/person_mentioned*,— The *person_mentioned*present administration*/person_mentioned* are taking some high handed Measures, at *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*Commandant of the Marine*/person_mentioned* has been taken from his *location_mentioned*station */location_mentioned*and dismissed the service without even the form of a tryal, Commissions which were issued by *person_mentioned*Guerrero */person_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*privateers */person_mentioned*have also been taken from them when just ready to sail (after incuring all the Expense of fitting out) — Poor *person_mentioned*Thompson */person_mentioned*who went from this place to *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* recently has been arrested there and confined to the *location_mentioned*Congresso 74*/location_mentioned*. and I am free to confess that I entertain some fears myself if I return that I my take up my summer quarters in the *location_mentioned*Castle of San Juan de Ulloa*/location_mentioned* for overstaying my leave, however the next accounts will determine me, if I believe there is a probability of being arrested I shall be sent down by the *person_mentioned*consul */person_mentioned*as *person_mentioned*bearer of Dispatches*/person_mentioned* for the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*which will protect me until my arrival in the *location_mentioned*City of Mexico*/location_mentioned* where I can resign—*/p*
*p*Meanwhile old foolish *person_mentioned*Ferdinand */person_mentioned*is preparing another expidition to reconquer *person_mentioned*Mexico*/person_mentioned*—8000, *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*have saild from *location_mentioned*Cadiz*/location_mentioned*, to be followed by 7000 more and also a new *person_mentioned*Governor for the *location_mentioned*Island of Cuba*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, but it is doubtful, if they gett farther than *location_mentioned*Cuba */location_mentioned*for the present (unless they turn their attention to *location_mentioned*Hayti */location_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*of which has Declared wars against *location_mentioned*Spain*/location_mentioned*,) as I am told by some *person_mentioned*gentlemen */person_mentioned*recently from *location_mentioned*Havana */location_mentioned*that the *person_mentioned*Troops */person_mentioned*there manifest such a reluctance to embark for *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*from the severe loss the last expedition sustained, that nothing short of a revolution will be the consequence if they are driven to the last extreemity— amongst other projects before *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*is one to repeal the law of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-189">last year*/date_mentioned* prohibiting the admission of foreign Cotton goods, so you may perceive that no dependence can be placed on the acts of the Goverment, the fact is Such a man as*person_mentioned* Santa Ana*/person_mentioned* is much wanted at the Head of affairs, one who has energy enough to adhere to measures when once adopted, and who will by the bayonet if it be necessary, quiet the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and end this grito work,—*/p*
*p*I fear the law alluded to to stop emigration will pass— I do not presume to advise you what course to persue it would be presumption in me to do so, but If I might be allowed to express an opinion it is that whatever may be done by the*person_mentioned* Present Party*/person_mentioned*, no difficulty will exist when they go out to get things put on their proper and former footing by their *person_mentioned*successors */person_mentioned*who I think inevitably must be *person_mentioned*Santa Ana*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Guerrero*/person_mentioned*, therefore it occurs that it would be most prudent to keep quiet for the present at least and watch how affairs are going to turn— If I go to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*you may rest assured if I have any influence there it shall be exerted for you, and I shall certainly see *person_mentioned*Genl. Santa Ana*/person_mentioned* before I leave that part of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*.— and whatever course you may eventually adopt you can depend on one person at least to act or suffer with you—*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-07-1830">April 7th*/date_mentioned* the Schr. Nimble so anxiously expected arrived *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">yesterday*/date_mentioned* and the accounts by her are very discouraging It is said that *person_mentioned*Guerrero */person_mentioned*has taken the field, and that *person_mentioned*Genl. Montes de Oca */person_mentioned*and others have formed here not that this part is discouraging I alluded to such parts as interested myself. We have *location_mentioned*Mexican papers*/location_mentioned* to the *date_mentioned n="03-19-1830">19th Ult*/date_mentioned*. I see by the proceeding of *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*that the *person_mentioned*Eastern department*/person_mentioned* has been divided and a *person_mentioned*Commandancia General*/person_mentioned* for the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* will be Established at *location_mentioned*San Antonio de Bejar. */location_mentioned*That *person_mentioned*Troops */person_mentioned*are ordered from *location_mentioned*different sections of the country*/location_mentioned*— to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*quite from *location_mentioned*Oajaca*/location_mentioned*, I am inclined to think if *person_mentioned*Guerrero */person_mentioned*assumed a prominent stand the *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*or at least those the present party can rely on will be detained and I am not sure that the *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* story is [not] used as pretext for removing such part from the *location_mentioned*Capital */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*neighbourhood */location_mentioned*as have not the confidence of the present gang—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Bravo Brig of War */person_mentioned*was still at *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Thompson*/person_mentioned* sends me word not to come there at present—as I am entered as A *person_mentioned*deserter */person_mentioned*for overstaying my leave he is still arrested and is very like to continue so for some time— I think I shall go down and take the worst of it If I am quartered in the *location_mentioned*Castle */location_mentioned*this ensuing *date_mentioned n="Summer - 1830">summer*/date_mentioned* I shall have one consolation at least, that I am out of the reach of the Yellow fever meanwhile by the next vessel that leave this for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* You will be informed if I go and as I do not on any account mean to abandon my intentions relative to the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*I applyed for I beg you if the grant has been received from the *person_mentioned*Governor */person_mentioned*to retain for me such as you may believe to be the best that can be located, and select for me as you may believe to be most desirable and I assure you I shall be satisfyed— If you deem my correspondence of any value I assure you I shall be extreemly happy to hear from you, and all letters addressed to *person_mentioned*Mr. Breedlove*/person_mentioned* will be forwarded to me whether I am to the *location_mentioned*north */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*South*/location_mentioned*—and I will endeavour to be punctual—you will see that I have written this without much care or conections so I beg your indulgence of its numerous imperfections,—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Edward L. Pettit*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* */p* */div1*
